projects.title: Customer Segmentation
projects.description: Used clustering algorithms to segment customers based on purchasing behavior, resulting in a 15% increase in marketing campaign effectiveness.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict equipment failures, reducing downtime by 30% and saving $500k annually in maintenance costs.

projects.title: Sales Forecasting
projects.description: Built a time series forecasting model to predict product demand, improving inventory management and reducing stockouts by 25%.
